subject: Fixing the notification_noti_get_detail_list function
commitMessage:
Fixing the notification_noti_get_detail_list function

Is safer using sqlite3_mprintf instead of using snprintf and is better
set the limit (count) for the query to avoid need an internal counter.

Change-Id: I0e921af261634202894cc150c2770b1270dc8a5c
Signed-off-by: Iván Briano <ivan.briano@intel.com>

subject: Adding a new api to get notifications
commitMessage:
Adding a new api to get notifications

Allowing to get the notifications as they are fetching, It's useful
to do lazy loading of the notifications, improving the responsiveness of
applications.

Change-Id: I325c7c76b35cd8cf2ebf897df49837747ac4bd50
Signed-off-by: Iván Briano <ivan.briano@intel.com>

subject: Add API to merge notifications from two different contacts
commitMessage:
Add API to merge notifications from two different contacts

When two contacts are merged into one, the notifications from one of
them need to be moved to the other.

Change-Id: I3f17f380a9f7a7c6029b5078742f3f71f22fc68b
Signed-off-by: Iván Briano <ivan.briano@intel.com>

subject: Add person_id field to notifications
commitMessage:
Add person_id field to notifications

Allows linking a notification to the person that generated it, making it
possible for applications to display contact information alongside the
notifications.

The following API calls are now available:

 - notification_error_e notification_get_person(notification_h noti,
                                                 int * ret_person_db_id);
 - notification_error_e notification_set_person(notification_h noti,
                                                 person_db_id);
 - notification_error_e notification_get_person_list(int person_db_id, int co~
                                                      notification_list_h * l~
 - notification_error_e notification_get_with_person_list(int count,
                                                           notification_list_~

Change-Id: Ic99f774794ab2374483bc2b2703f99b51bb8b5b2
Signed-off-by: Iván Briano <ivan.briano@intel.com>
